EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners / John McFarland (1366148594.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners / John McFarland (1366148594.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - Consultant Services Email - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi John, Its a hard market right now, so stick with it! I will send you the link to enroll with MBO in a separate email. Ive enclosed a few resources that you might find helpful in finding your next project: - Here is a short list of some of our top clients within MBO Access <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Access_Information.pdf?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>. - We have an index of recorded Webinars that will comprehensively cover everything to do with working independently. You can see them by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>. - You can review our Independents Guide by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/independents-guide?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> - You can join MBOs LinkedIn in group by going here <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=71161&mostPopular=&trk=tyah&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>. - Lastly, you can view all the information we spoke about over the phone by going here. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://info.mbopartners.com/advisor-info-s-conde.html?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> (Please bookmark this page.) I will follow up with you, if you have questions before then, feel free to schedule a convenient time for you using my online schedule. <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&https://my.timedriver.com/8SLYS?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> Best of luck finding your next contract, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> Weve got some serious perks youre eligible to win when you refer a friend <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://referral.mbopartners.com/referral-program?r=conde&mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> to MBO Partners! Ask me about them. Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:postmaster@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCcVRfs0tW6e6WLaL%2BnDrOaY2kr7VzDrrq3sxw2kdzGIalUg%3D%3D> and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: John McFarland [mailto:john.mcfarland80@yahoo.com] Sent: Tuesday, April 16, 2013 9:24 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: MBO Partners / John McFarland Hi Sara, I haven't been able to land a contract yet, but I would be interested in hearing about the consultant resources that I could use. I also want to go ahead and sign up for MBO partners. Please let me know when a good time is for you to chat again via phone? John
Respectfully, John McFarland On Apr 13, 2013, at 3:47 PM, "Sara Conde" <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote: Hello John, I wanted to touch base as a courtesy and see how the contract search is going. We have a number of consultant resources that we continually update that you may find helpful. You may find them here: http://www.mbopartners.com/resources <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MzgmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYzOCZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjE2NDEmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyODI2MjYmZW1haWxpZD1qb2huLm1jZmFybGFuZDgwQHlhaG9vLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMjYyMDktMTAxOTU1LTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/resources?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56%2B0kXKKg38431UFwdcjKPmjr1YIDTsV0dvycMRAVFZl5nQFaFQ%3D%3D>. In addition, if you have any suggestions for new resources that might help other consultants - please let us know! Any update would be great, look forward to hearing from you. Regards,Sara___________________________________Sara Conde Consultant Services AdvisorMBO Partners t: (703) 793-6028f: 703-793-6070e: sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?type=click&enid=bWFpbGluZ2lkPXByb2QtbC02MzgmbWVzc2FnZWlkPTYzOCZkYXRhYmFzZWlkPTEzNTYxNjE2NDEmc2VyaWFsPTEyNjUyODI2MjYmZW1haWxpZD1qb2huLm1jZmFybGFuZDgwQHlhaG9vLmNvbSZ1c2VyaWQ9bC0xMjgtMjYyMDktMTAxOTU1LTEmZXh0cmE9JiYm&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=3RkMMJWWfF9wsRonvKjNZKXonjHpfsX56%2B0kXKKg38431UFwdcjKPmjr1YIDTsV0dvycMRAVFZl5nQFaFQ%3D%3D></b
